title: Bores Me to Tears
lyrics:
Leaders of men
They talk about love
And it bores me to tears
Talk about love
And shatter their mirrors
And it bores me to tears



Everything they say

Everything they say

It bores me to tears



They talk about war

And they talk about love

And it bores me to tears

Talk about change

Ch-change, change

And it bores me to tears



Everything they say

Everything they say

It bores me to tears
